normalised: Rental Agreements: Need-to-Knows Before You Sign That Dotted Line!

Hey everyone, looking to rent a place in Bangalore or Mumbai soon? Or maybe you're a landlord renting out your ancestral property in Delhi? Then this is for you! Rental agreements are crucial, and trust me, getting it right from the start saves a lot of headache later.

unnormalised: **Rental Agreements: Need-to-Knows Before You Sign That Dotted Line!**
normalised: First, never, ever rely on just a verbal agreement. Get everything in writing. That eleven month agreement (the typical one in India to avoid registration headaches) should clearly state the rent amount (say, rupee fifteen thousand), the security deposit (maybe rupee fifty thousand), and the maintenance charges.
